name: LSD_Gamejam "Hallucinations"
description:
Welcome To Hallucinations!

This is a relaxing exploring type top down 2.5D orthoscopic  world! your a little wolf that has various dreams about different locations.

figure out how to get to the different sleep states and levels within the game! Collect all the in game items and build up your collection over time!

For optimal play please download the EXE. Web variant is still playable but random generation can suffer depending on browser used. Local saves only work on EXE. 

Basic Controls.

AWDS to move up right left and down. Use Q and E to rotate your dream world. 

Push F to focus within a dream to pass through walls and buildings.

Walk off the edges to go to a new dream level!

Adjust the clock when able to lengthen or shorten your dreams!

Esc to quit game. R to restart game.

90% of the art was done during the jam period. Character art is recycled from previous projects just trying to improve the style. 

Other art mentions and contributions!

Ambient Music by https://saffronwerkz.itch.io/

StarBackgrounds by https://itch.io/profile/helianthus-games
